research_summary: The San Francisco 49ers' Super Bowl dreams were dashed in a heartbreaking 25-22 overtime loss to the Kansas City Chiefs on February 11, 2024, at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas. Despite leading for much of the game and showcasing a dominant defense for stretches, the 49ers ultimately succumbed to Pat
key_facts: The 49ers lost to the Kansas City Chiefs 25-22 in overtime in Super Bowl LVIII on February 11, 2024.
Jake Moody missed an extra point in the fourth quarter, which proved crucial in the final score.
Patrick Mahomes threw for 333 yards and 2 touchdowns and rushed for 66 yards, earning him Super Bowl MVP honors.
The 49ers defense held the Chiefs to just 3 points in the entire 3rd quarter.
